mapper.select: SELECT o_no AS ONO, o_t_no AS TNO, o_ordtime AS ORDERTIME, o_paytime AS PAYTIME, o_servtime AS SERVTIME FROM morder WHERE o_t_no = #{tno} AND (o_paytime = o_servtime OR o_ordtime = o_paytime) ORDER BY o_no
SELECT m_name AS MNAME, om_num AS MNUM, om_o_no AS ONO FROM ordermenu, menu WHERE om_m_no = m_no AND om_o_no = #{ono}

SELECT oc_t_no AS TNO, oc_open AS OPENTIME, oc_close AS CLOSETIME, p_no AS PNO, p_placename AS PLACENAME FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT oc_t_no, oc_open, oc_close FROM openclose WHERE oc_t_no = #{tno} AND to_date(oc_open,'YYYY/MM/DD') = to_date(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY oc_open DESC) WHERE rownum = 1), place, plan WHERE pp_t_no = oc_t_no AND pp_p_no = p_no AND to_date(pp_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') = to_date(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO openclose VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(oc_no),0)+1 FROM openclose), #{tno}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{pno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE openclose SET oc_close = SYSDATE WHERE oc_t_no = #{tno} AND to_date(oc_open,'YYYY/MM/DD')=to_date(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')
mapper.select: SELECT pp_p_no AS PNO, p_placename AS PNAME, t_name AS TNAME FROM plan, place, truckinfo WHERE pp_t_no = #{tno} AND to_date(pp_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') = to_date(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND pp_t_no = t_no AND pp_p_no = p_no

SELECT om_o_no AS ONO, om_m_no AS MNO, om_num AS MNUM, m_name AS MNAME, m_price AS PRICE FROM (SELECT om_o_no, om_m_no, om_num FROM ordermenu WHERE om_o_no = #{ono} ORDER BY om_no), menu WHERE om_m_no = m_no
SELECT o_no AS ONO, o_t_no AS TNO, o_ordTime AS ORDERTIME, t_name AS TNAME FROM (SELECT o_no, o_t_no, o_ordTime FROM morder WHERE o_no=#{ono}), truckinfo WHERE o_t_no = t_no
mapper.update: UPDATE morder SET o_paytime = SYSDATE, o_servtime = SYSDATE WHERE o_no = #{ono}
UPDATE morder SET o_servtime = SYSDATE WHERE o_no = #{ono}
mapper.select: SELECT m_no AS MNO, m_name AS MNAME, m_price AS PRICE, m_savename AS SAVENAME FROM menu WHERE m_t_no = #{tno} AND m_isshow = 'Y'
